name: kids school bus parking 3d
description:
kids school bus parking 3d

School bus parking 3D is an exciting game where you can learn the road rules and prove that you can drive a car in a real world enviroment.

kids School parking3D is a realistic simulator that allows you to choose between different cars, buses and trucks...
More than 40 levels with different driving scenarios are waiting you. Show off your driving skills, play School Driving 3D!
Now you can drive with a manual transmission, with clutch and stick shift!
Play with your friends in a free ride multiplayer mode!

key features:

=> Smooth and realistic car handling
=> Different licenses to take, Car, Bus and Truck
=> Realistic damage system
